wordGroup: carbon monoxide poisoning 一氧化碳中毒

sentences.en: CO is the formula for carbon monoxide.
The limit for carbon monoxide is 4.5 per cent of the exhaust gas.
sentences.cn: 尾气中一氧化碳的排放量限制在4.5% 以下。

sentences.en: Both nicotine and carbon monoxide inhaled with cigarette smoking have been incriminated as causative factors.
sentences.cn: 与香烟一起吸入的尼古丁和一氧化碳已经被指控为诱发性因素。
